GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.19.8
GSD.description:
clk: bcm: rpi: Prevent out-of-bounds access

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit c8b04b731d43366824841ebdca4ac715f95e0ea4, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 93d2725affd65686792f4b57e49ef660f3c8c0f9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: clk: bcm: rpi: Prevent out-of-bounds access
